techmeme.title: SCOTUS agrees to hear Facebook's bid to scuttle a private securities fraud lawsuit over allegedly misleading investors on Cambridge Analytica in 2017 and 2018 (John Kruzel/Reuters)
SCOTUS declines to question the FCC's $8B annual subsidy to help cover telecom costs for poor people and residents of rural area, turning away two appeals (Greg Stohr/Bloomberg)
New Jersey-based IT provider Cognizant agrees to acquire digital engineering company Belcan, which employs 10K across 60 locations, for $1.3B in cash and stock (Milana Vinn/Reuters)
Sources: Shein recorded $32.2B in sales in 2023, up 40% YoY, compared with 37% YoY growth in 2022, and doubled its net profit to $1.6B, for a 5% profit margin (Jing Yang/The Information)
Nokia CEO Pekka Lundmark made a phone call using new "immersive audio and video" tech that uses 3D sound on a 5G smartphone, as part of the 5G Advanced standard (Supantha Mukherjee/Reuters)
